DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the training effects of robot-assisted therapy focus on proximal part, distal part, or total segment of upper extremity, respectively.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Proximal and Distal Robot-assisted Therapy Combined With Functional Training
DOC.criteria: unilateral stroke that verified by CT scan Time since stroke more than 6 months moderate and mild upper limb motor impairment identified from the UE subtest of FMA range from 10 to 50 MiniMental State Examination (MMSE) more than 24 points is needed to follow commands serious visual or visual perception problems orthopedic or other neurological problems occurred in recent 6 months attend any other study in recent 3 months
